snippet: Six burglaries in the West Village last month have been attributed to the same person, the police said, some involving smashed windows and an improvised key.
abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column notes that police believe the same person committed six burglaries in the West Village in November; in some cases the burglar gained entry using a brick through a window and in others an improvised key.
lead_paragraph: Six burglaries in the West Village last month have been attributed to the same person, the police said, some involving smashed windows and an improvised key.

headline.seo: A Calling Card in Shards of Glass
headline.main: A Calling Card in Shards of Glass
headline.print_headline: A Calling Card In Shards Of Glass
